transcript: well I definitely admire Andrew Peggy churn from Panda Express because they're a married couple who built this whole thing and they never took out outside money and they've owned the whole thing privately they have 2 600 locations they do 3.7 billion a year with 27 net margins and they take 935 million a year in personal income and I think that's only possible because they have created a new vision for what they wanted the company to be about which is about their employees
